item.title: Generational networking opportunities
item.dc:creator: Olinta Lopez
item.description:
Networking is a crucial aspect of professional development, but it can be challenging when dealing with different generations. Each generation has its own values, communication styles, and expectations, making it difficult to establish meaningful connections. However, networking among different generations can lead to a diverse and inclusive workplace and provide opportunities for personal and professional …
